text: allaha te ja che jene akasa ane dharatinum sarjana cha divasamam karyum ane tenum arsa pani para hatum, jethi te tamari kasoti kare ke tamara manthi satkarya karanara kona che, jo tame temane kaho ke tame loko mrtyu pamya pachi pacha jivita karavamam avaso to inkara karanara javaba apase ke a to spasta jadu che
